summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hotel Breakfast Kiosk application including backend APIs, frontend UI, and end-to-end integration flows. All core functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: API Root endpoint (200 OK with correct message)
Menu categories endpoint (4 categories with all required fields)
Menu items endpoint - all items (24 items across 4 categories)
Menu items by category (6 items each for hot-breakfast, bakery, healthy, beverages)
Order creation endpoint (proper MongoDB storage and response)
Branding configuration endpoint (correct default values)
Error handling for invalid endpoints (proper 404 responses)
Welcome page loads with luxury design and hero image
All 4 category buttons navigate to correct menu pages
Menu pages display correct number of items with images and descriptions
Add to cart functionality with toast notifications
Cart badge updates showing correct item count
Cart page displays items with quantity controls (increase/decrease/remove)
Table number selection using number pad (with clear and backspace)
Checkout page shows order summary with correct totals
Order confirmation completes successfully
End-to-end order flow from welcome to confirmation
Touch targets meet kiosk requirements (270x190px > 60px minimum)
Typography using Playfair Display and Manrope fonts as specified
Responsive design optimized for 1920x1080 kiosk resolution
Empty cart state displays correctly with back to menu option
Multiple items from different categories can be added to cart
Item removal from cart works correctly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (12/12 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (20+ UI flows tested successfully)
